column3: Which team is going to win the Euro 2016?
column7: Choose the team you believe will lift the Euro 2016 trophy and become European champions.

column3: How many goals will be scored in total?
column7: Predict the total number of goals you believe will be scored during the world cup. This does not include any goals scored during penalty shoot-outs. All users that predict the total number within a threshold of 10 goals will be awarded with the points.

column3: Which team will receive the most yellow cards?
column7: Predict which team will be shown the most yellow cards during the Euro 2016.

column3: How many yellow cards will be shown in total?
column7: Predict the total number of yellow cards you believe will be shown during the world cup. All users that predict the total number within a threshold of 20 cards will be awarded with the points.

column3: Which team will receive the most red cards?
column7: Predict which team will be shown the most red cards during the Euro 2016.

column3: How many red cards will be shown in total?
column7: Predict the total number of red cards you believe will be shown during the world cup.

column3: Which team will score the fastest goal?
column7: Make a prediction on which team you believe will score the quickest goal during the Euro 2016.
